name: yoga-layout
description: Yoga is a cross-platform layout engine enabling maximum collaboration within your team by implementing an API many designers are familiar with, and opening it up to developers across different platforms.

scripts.build:node: npm run copy-sources && autogypi && node-gyp configure build
scripts.build:browser: npm run copy-sources && autogypi && node-gyp configure build --asmjs=1
scripts.build:all: npm run build:node && npm run build:browser
scripts.test:node: TEST_ENTRY=node time mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --expose-gc -r tests/tools.js tests/Facebook.Yoga/**/*.js
scripts.test:browser: TEST_ENTRY=browser time mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --expose-gc -r tests/tools.js tests/Facebook.Yoga/**/*.js
scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.benchmark: npm run prepublish && node tests/run-bench $(find tests/Benchmarks -name '*.js')
scripts.prepublish: npm run copy-sources && babel sources --out-dir dist && flow-copy-source sources dist
